comment: Lemma for ~ ostth2 , although it is just a simple statement about exponentials which does not involve any specifics of ~ ostth2 . If a power is upper bounded by a linear term, the exponent must be less than one. Or in big-O notation, ` n e. o ( A ^ n ) ` for any ` 1 < A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2014.)
